law.catch_line: Applicability of Subtitles 2 and 3 to captive insurers.
law.text: Insurers holding a certificate of authority issued under this subtitle shall be subject to the provisions of Subtitles 2 and 3 of this chapter to the extent applicable and not in conflict with the expressed provisions of this subtitle.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 9, effective July 14, 2000.
